description: Hi my name is Izzy, To make you happy I have been busy, Drawing these funny Christmas Cards for you. I hope you smile and like them too, If you want to wish a person happy new year, Or just wish them some Happy Holiday cheer, These funny xmas cards will do just the job, 36 Christmas cards in a boxed set, So if you miss somebody out you need not fret, Plenty to go round for all to see , Everyone who gets one will be filled with glee, That is it now I am done, Happy Holidays Everyone.
